title: Marriage Banner
description: two horizontal flannel sections, each with five embroidered tableaus depicting fanciful animated reptiles and animals separated by vertical straps with tacked-on floral and fauna appliqued medallions with tassels; top section is light blue, bottom red; brown border on each section; embroidery is multicolored pastels with black accents; doubled 8\" white strip across top, probably for hanging; dark blue lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
